settings.title: Promed Laser Hair Removal – Smooth Skin at Your Fingertips
settings.text: Smooth Skin Now Made Convenient From The Comfort Of Your Home

settings.title: Two Modes: Manual and Automatic
settings.text: Easily switch between manual and automatic mode per your convenience and control over the device, offering a truly customizable experience.

settings.title: Face and Full-Body Hair Removal
settings.text: Unlike other devices, our dermatologist-approved IPL Hair Removal Device is safe to use not just on your body but also your face.

settings.title: Cutting-Edge IPL Technology
settings.text: PROMED utilizes Intense Pulsed Light (IPL) Technology, in which 999,999 rapid flashes of light per second target the melanin in hair follicles for optimal skin coverage.

settings.title: Six Intensity Levels
settings.text: You can ensure confident hair removal even in sensitive areas with varying six intensity levels.

settings.title: Sapphire Cooling System
settings.text: With an integrated sapphire cooling system, you can ensure a stress-free experience without having to worry about the device getting overheated.

settings.title: Six Unique Accessories
settings.text:
Every PROMED IPL Hair Removal Machine comes with:

  • A large head, ideal for underarms and lower legs. 
  • Two precision heads, ideal for the face and bikini line. 
  • Protective glasses to shield your eyes from the intense light flashes. 
  • An easy-to-grip plug-in adapter. 
  • Charger for consistent use of the device.

settings.heading: A Revolution in Hair Removal
settings.content: Our PROMED IPL laser hair removal machine combines cutting-edge technology with ease of use, delivering impressive hair removal results with consistent use.

settings.rich_text:
Trusted by Thousands of Happy Customers

Our customers have achieved the desired results with our PROMED IPL laser hair removal devices. Watch their testimonials to hear about their amazing experiences and results.
Real Reviews, Real Results - Watch Customer Testimonials

settings.qus: Is Promed Laser Hair Removal Safe for All Skin Types?
settings.ans: Yes, our IPL laser hair removal devices are designed to be safe for a range of skin tones and types.

settings.qus: How Often Should I Use the Promed Ipl Laser Hair Removal Device?
settings.ans: We recommend using the device once a week for the first 4-5 weeks, then reducing frequency as hair regrowth diminishes. You will achieve noticeable results within 8 weeks.

settings.qus: Does Ipl Laser Hair Removal Hurt?
settings.ans: Not at all! Our IPL Hair Removal machine uses institute-grade technology and provides a pain-free experience. You may feel a mild warming sensation; however, it doesn’t hurt.

settings.qus: Can I use the PROMED Device on Sensitive Areas?
settings.ans: Yes, PROMED IPL Laser Hair Removal Device is specially designed to be used on the entire body even on sensitive areas such as the face, underarms, and bikini line.

settings.qus: When will I See the Results?
settings.ans: You can achieve long-lasting results within 8 weeks.
As long as you’re using the provided protective eye protection, it will not affect your eyesight.

settings.qus: How Long Will It Take for My Order to Arrive?
settings.ans: The order will be shipped within 2-3 business days with hassle-free 30-day returns on our product.

settings.qus: What Are the Payment Options Available?
settings.ans: We accept all payment methods: PayPal, Visa Cards, Master Card, Apple Pay, and Google Pay.

settings.new_text: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive our offers, promotions and news. You can unsubscribe at any time.
